name: Noxious by Vitoco
description:
Noxious

(c) 2021 by Victor Parada

Many colorful, swaying and

noxious creatures attack you

on your interstellar journey.

Be faster!

Game written for NOMAM's

BASIC 10-liners Contest 2021.

Requires:

- Atari XL/XE (or emulator)

- FastBasic 4.5.2 IDE

- Paddle controller

Load instructions:

- Boot NOXIOUS.ATR disk

  without BASIC ROM.

- Load FBI.COM from DOS.

- Type CTRL-L and type

  D:NOXIOUS.LST and press

  RETURN key.

- Type CTRL-R to parse 

  and run the game.

- Play the game.

- Press Fire to play again.

Game instructions:

- Use the paddle to position

  your battleship in the

  desired location.

- Press the trigger to fire.

- Hold the trigger for a

  continuous shooting.

- Avoid bombs.

- You have only one ship. If

  it is destroyed, the game

  is over.
